Just wanna say that I'm so happy for Kiara that she is now able to show the power she holds with these JP collaborations. I felt like she's being hard on herself because there's some mishaps along the way such as tech errors on stream and other things that's taking a toll on her mental health. I'm so happy that you've risen like a phoenix, Kiara. I know this is not the end but the start of a wonderful journey. Congratulations for a successful stream!
Yeah the possibilities are immense for her, basically being bilingual, she'll be the bridge with jp

I feel like she really takes for granted the fact that she gets to meet and collaborate with her JP peers, all of them offline thus far, which is inherently more personal and genuine. Since she mentioned being a Hololive fan herself, being able to essentially hang out with the people you admire, I’m pretty sure that’s living the dream
yeah, she might not be as big as the others,  but now that EN are allowed to collab outside, she can finally show her skill, and I wish this'll help her grow so much more.
